oracle_text: Vivid — {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.
flavor_text: Heart calmed by the beauty of the blossom, the dawnhand wondered who was actually protecting whom.

name: Ajani, Outland Chaperone
oracle_text:
+1: Create a 1/1 green and white Kithkin creature token.
−2: Ajani deals 4 damage to target tapped creature.
−8: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is your life total. You may put any number of nonland permanent cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.

name: Overgrown Tomb
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
flavor_text: The elf was disgusted by the bramble before him when the skies darkened, then he stepped closer to observe the wild beauty.
